notes: CloudState.build now uses App.schedulesEngine.toSnapshot() for data.schedules and no longer inspects App.state.schedules/App.data.schedules directly.
CloudState.apply routes schedules exclusively through App.schedulesEngine.fromSnapshot(); state/data schedules arrays are maintained only via schedulesEngine._syncAlias.
All major read paths (statistics, monitoring, calendar, capitalflow, report, debtor detail) consume schedules from App.schedulesEngine.* APIs only.
runShadowQA in cloudState now records aliasConsistency, checking that App.state.schedules and App.data.schedules share the same array reference as App.schedulesEngine.list.
